name: agentex_builder
description: Build and deploy AI agents programmatically using the AgentEX standard. Validate requirements before building, generate production-ready code, track build status, discover available tools, and deploy to hosting platforms. Always validate before generating to catch issues early.

action.description: Action to perform: 'validate' (check if agent requirements are valid before building), 'generate' (create agent code after validation passes), 'status' (check build progress), 'deploy' (publish to hosting platform), 'search_tools' (discover available tools by category/capability), 'get_tool' (get detailed info about specific tool)

description.description: What the agent should do, in plain English (required for validate/generate actions)

brain.description: AI model to power the agent. Options: 'claude-3-5-sonnet' (recommended), 'gpt-4', 'gpt-4-turbo', 'llama-3-70b' (required for validate/generate actions)

tools.description: List of tool IDs to include in the agent. Use search_tools action first to discover available tools. Example: ['helius-rpc', 'resend-email', 'web-search'] (required for validate/generate actions)

runtime.description: Target deployment runtime. Options: 'vercel' (serverless, free tier), 'railway' (always-on, $5/mo), 'render' (always-on, free tier available), 'fly' (edge deployment). Leave empty and validation will recommend the best option based on your requirements (optional for validate, required for generate)

config.description: Optional configuration for the agent (only for generate action)

temperature.description: Model temperature for responses. 0 = deterministic, 2 = creative. Default: 0.7

cronSchedule.description: Cron schedule for periodic execution. Example: '0 * * * *' runs hourly, '0 0 * * *' runs daily. Only use if agent needs scheduled tasks.

timeout.description: Maximum execution time in seconds. Default: 30. Use higher values for long-running tasks.

buildId.description: Build ID returned from generate action (required for status/deploy actions)

platform.description: Deployment platform (required for deploy action). 'vercel' = one-click Vercel deployment, 'github' = create GitHub repository, 'railway' = deploy to Railway

credentials.description: Platform credentials for deployment (required for deploy action)

apiKey.description: API key for the deployment platform. Get from: Vercel (vercel.com/account/tokens), Railway (railway.app/account/tokens), GitHub (github.com/settings/tokens)

query.description: Text search query to find tools (for search_tools action). Example: 'solana blockchain', 'send email', 'web scraping'

category.description: Filter tools by category (for search_tools action). Options: 'blockchain', 'communication', 'data', 'ai', 'utility'

capabilities.description: Filter tools by required capabilities (for search_tools action). Example: ['getBalance', 'sendTransaction'] for blockchain tools

toolId.description: Specific tool ID to get detailed information about (for get_tool action). Example: 'helius-rpc', 'resend-email'
